Publisher: Albrecht Schmidt (German, active in Augsburg, 18th century (first half))
Credit Line: The Elisha Whittelsey Collection, The Elisha Whittelsey Fund 1941
Description: Rectangular design for the lid of a tobacco box. In the center a compartment with a seascape showing two large boats and one small fishing boat in the foreground. The scene is surrounded by a decorative frame with a small scene of men with items from a ship's freight. On top a trophy with shells, anchors and fish held by a crouching man.
